description:
學習社會及行為的研究方法，從題目的選擇、文獻回顧、研究架構的設定、問卷設計、進階統計分析、到報告撰寫等。透過選讀學術期刊文章來認識進階的研究議題：包括共同方法變異、多階層研究，並選擇一個研究題目來實作研究過程。
To learn how to choose a research topic, conduct a literature review, set up a theoretical framework, design questionnaires, analyzing data statistically, and write a research report. The students will practice a research project individually.

syllabus.zh:
一、社會科學研究的理論：
1. 範型、理論與研究
2. 因果關係的本質

二、研究規劃與設計：
3. 研究設計
4. 概念化、測量與問卷設計
5. 抽樣
6. 共同方法變異
7. 多層次研究議題

三、研究執行策略：
8. 調查研究法
9. 田野調查法

四、研究分析方法：
10. 資料的量化與分析
11. 社會與行為統計
12. 社會與行為研究的倫理
syllabus.en:
1. Paradigms, Theory, and Research.
2. The characteristics of Casual Relationship.
3. Research Design.
4. Conceptualization, Measurement and Questionnaire Design.
5. Sampling.
6. Common Method Variance.
7. Multi-level Research Issues.
8. Survey Research.
9. Qualitative Field Research.
10. Quantitative Data Analysis.
11. Social and Behavioral Statistics.
12. The Ethics of Social and Behavioral Research

teachingAndAssessment.objective: To be able to understand the core concepts and knowledge of research methods.
To be able to acquire the skills of collecting first and secondary data.
To be able to apply professional statistical software on data analysis and to interpret its output properly.
To accomplish a research report with analysis results under standard format.
To be able to cultivate a good learning attitude and independent-research spirit.
